name: css-tree
description: a tool set for css: fast detailed parser (css → ast), walker (ast traversal), generator (ast → css) and lexer (validation and matching) based on specs and browser implementations
kwds: a tool set for css: fast detailed parser (css → ast), walker (ast traversal), generator (ast → css) and lexer (validation and matching) based on specs and browser implementations css ast tokenizer parser walker lexer generator utils syntax validation
